nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.accounts

Interface AccountTypeServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AccountTypeService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountTypeServiceImpl

    public interface AccountTypeServiceLocal
extends AccountTypeService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.
